interests.text: Programming (duh!), Reading, Shakespeare, Acting, and Philosophy

computer.text: I use a 13' Macbook Pro (lowest spec) and an iPad 3

editor.text: I use Jetbrains IDEs for programming. I use vim and Sublime Text for generic stuff. I sometimes use Apple Pages, but I grumble about it.

falkirks.text: I came up with it when I was 7, so don't judge too heavily. I have family in Falkirk, Scotland and thought it would be a cool name.
